mapper.select: select * from MEETINGMEMBER inner join MEETING on meetingmember.meet_no = meeting.meet_no where user_no=#{mNo};
select * from MEETINGMEMBER where MEET_NO=#{meetNo} and USER_NO=#{mNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM MEETINGMEMBER where MEET_NO=#{meetNo}
SELECT DISTINCT M.MEET_NO, M.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) from MEETINGMEMBER MM where MM.MEET_NO = M.MEET_NO) AS COUNT FROM MEETING M LEFT OUTER JOIN MEETINGMEMBER MM ON MM.MEET_NO = M.MEET_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEETINGMEMBER WHERE MEET_NO=#{meetNo} AND USER_NO=#{mNo}
